item.title: 泰勒-考恩谈为什么人工智能没有改变世界
item.description: 在许多方面，人工智能技术已经让人叹为观止，它能比普通人更好地完成许多任务。但总的来说，它的影响还很难被察觉。举例来说，我们还没有看到大规模的劳动力转移。生产率数据中也没有任何戏剧性的变化。那么，什么时候才能真正感受到这种影响呢？在本期节目中，我们将采访乔治梅森大学教授、著名经济学博客《边际革命》（Marginal Revolution）的作者之一泰勒-考恩（Tyler Cowen）。他是【原文：In many respects, AI technology is already mind-blowing, and can perform many tasks far better than the average person. And yet by and large, its impact has been hard to detect. We haven’t seen some huge labor displacement, for example. There’s nothing dramatic yet happening in the productivity data. So when will the impact really start to be felt? On this episode, we speak with Tyler Cowen, a professor at George Mason University and the co-author of the famed econ blog Marginal Revolution. He’s】

item.title: 巴黎公寓价格创近五年来最大涨幅
item.description: 巴黎公寓的购买成本连续第三个季度上涨，价格涨幅为 2020 年底以来最大。【原文：The cost of purchasing a Parisian apartment rose for the third consecutive quarter, with prices jumping the most since the end of 2020.】

item.title: 德国财政部长称中国之行有助于弥合分歧
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）表示，他赢得了中国在保持关键原材料流通方面的保证，并阐述了他在本周为期四天的亚洲之行中取得的最大成就。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil said he won assurances from China on maintaining the flow of critical raw materials, laying out what he described as the biggest achievements of his four-day trip to Asia this week.】

item.title: 字节跳动公司股票拍卖估值飙升至 4800 亿美元
item.description: 一家中国投资公司以远高于近期水平的 4,800 亿美元估值买入了字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）的大量股票，这表明投资者对视频网站 TikTok 的母公司兴趣浓厚。【原文：A Chinese investment firm bought a block of ByteDance Ltd. shares at a valuation of $480 billion, far above recent levels, a sign of strong investor interest in the parent company of video sensation TikTok.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税如何无处不在又无处不在
item.description:
它们易于公布，更易于辩论，但要找到它们对经济的真正影响却难上加难—至少目前如此。【原文：

item.title: 印度企业集团巴贾投资部门从哥达克聘请首席信息官
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度历史最悠久的企业集团之一巴贾吉集团（Bajaj Group）旗下的另类投资管理部门聘请了科塔克另类资产管理公司（Kotak Alternate Asset Managers Ltd）的一名首席投资官，这凸显了价值 1,690 亿美元的资产管理行业人才争夺战愈演愈烈。【原文：The alternative investment management arm of the Bajaj Group, one of India’s oldest conglomerates, hired a chief investment officer from Kotak Alternate Asset Managers Ltd, according to people familiar with the matter, underscoring an intensifying talent battle in the $169 billion asset management industry.】

item.title: 收益和资金流入提振市场情绪，印度股市再创新高
item.description: 由于外资流入的恢复和企业盈利的改善提振了投资者的情绪，印度基准股指攀升至新纪录。【原文：India’s benchmark stock index climbed to a new record as a revival in foreign inflows and improving corporate earnings bolstered investor sentiment.】

item.title: 格拉斯称，在与中国的任何争端中，美国都是日本的后盾
item.description: 美国驻日本大使乔治-格拉斯（George Glass）周四表示，在日本首相高市佐奈发表的有关台湾的言论引发的日本与中国的争端中，美国是日本的后盾，并补充说中国政府的一些反应 "令人愤慨"。【原文：The US has Japan’s back in its dispute with China over remarks made by Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi about Taiwan, US Ambassador to Japan George Glass said Thursday, adding that some of the reaction from Beijing has been “outrageous.”】

item.title: 中国拒绝接受日本在台湾问题上的立场，要求撤回声明
item.description: 中国驳斥了日本关于其台湾政策保持不变的说法，再次要求日本首相高市真奈收回她的言论，因为两国之间的紧张局势几乎没有降温的迹象。【原文：China dismissed Japan’s claim that its Taiwan policy remains unchanged, repeating its demand that Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi retract her remarks, as tensions between the two countries show little sign of cooling.】

item.title: 诺和诺德推动丹麦实现四年来最快增长
item.description: 由诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）主导的丹麦制药业的反弹，推动丹麦经济实现了近四年来最快的季度扩张。【原文：A rebound in Denmark’s pharmaceutical industry, dominated by Novo Nordisk A/S, powered the economy to its fastest quarterly expansion in almost four years.】

item.title: 英国房东疯狂收购后，LondonMetric 盈利大增
item.description: 英国房东伦敦美特物业公司（LondonMetric Property Plc）在截至 9 月份的六个月内实现了 9.7% 的盈利增长，这是因为该公司通过一系列收购扩大规模的竞赛取得了成效。【原文：UK landlord LondonMetric Property Plc delivered a 9.7% jump in earnings in the six months through September as the company’s race to scale up through a series of acquisitions took effect.】

item.title: 美国贸易关税影响下瑞士钟表出口10月再度下滑
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易关税继续对瑞士钟表业造成压力，瑞士钟表出口连续第三个月下降。【原文：Swiss watch exports fell for a third month as US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs continued to weigh on the industry.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩平息交易员担忧，欧洲股市将上涨
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）出人意料的强劲收入预期缓解了投资者对人工智能泡沫的担忧之后，欧洲股票期货攀升。【原文：European stock futures climbed after Nvidia Corp.’s surprisingly strong revenue forecast soothed investor fears of an artificial intelligence bubble.】

item.title: 日本政府即将推出 1120 亿美元的新刺激计划
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈将公布一项由额外预算资助的经济一揽子计划，该计划比她的前任一年前的支出计划中承诺的预算高出约 27%，这凸显了她对扩张性财政政策的承诺。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is set to unveil an economic package funded by an extra budget that’s about 27% bigger than what was pledged in her predecessor’s spending plan a year ago, underscoring her commitment to an expansive fiscal policy.】

item.description:

item.title: 瑞士对美出口在关税为 39% 的最后一整月出现下滑
item.description: 在上周达成降低美国总统唐纳德-特朗普 39% 关税的协议之前，瑞士与美国的贸易关系持续动荡，导致 10 月份瑞士对美出口下降。【原文：Switzerland’s exports to the US retreated in October amid ongoing volatility in their trade relationship before a deal last week to lower President Donald Trump’s 39% tariffs.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行开始回购，在股价下跌后提升资本目标
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）宣布了一项新的回购计划，并计划提前实现资本实力目标，首席执行官让-洛朗-邦纳夫（Jean-Laurent Bonnafe）正努力扭转近期股价下滑的趋势。【原文：BNP Paribas SA announced a new buyback and plans to reach a target for capital strength early as Chief Executive Officer Jean-Laurent Bonnafe seeks to reverse a recent slide in the stock price.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数将打破五日连跌走势
埃及通胀回升令华尔街对加息呼声众说纷纭
item.description: 埃及通胀率的意外回升让华尔街对该国 2025 年第五次降息的时机是否成熟产生了分歧。【原文：A surprise uptick in Egyptian inflation has Wall Street divided on whether the time is right for the nation’s fifth interest-rate cut of 2025.】

item.title: 马来西亚制药连锁企业 Big Caring 据称将探索 IPO 事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Big Caring Group Sdn. 正在考虑明年在吉隆坡进行首次公开募股。【原文：Big Caring Group Sdn. is considering an initial public offering in Kuala Lumpur next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 工党称将国家统计局迁回伦敦无法解决统计危机
item.description: 英国政府将把陷入困境的统计机构继续留在威尔士，因为在该国经济数据遭遇信任危机后，有关该机构选址的新问题又被提出来了。【原文：The UK government will keep its beleaguered statistics agency in Wales after fresh questions over its location were raised following a crisis of confidence in the country’s economic data.】

item.title: 阿什莫尔表示，英国并非唯一面临另一个 "利兹-特鲁斯时刻 "风险的国家
item.description: 资产管理公司阿什莫尔集团（Ashmore Group）的首席执行官马克-库姆斯（Mark Coombs）说，英国等国家出现赤字并依赖金融市场提供资金，"肯定 "有可能再次出现丽兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）时刻。【原文：Countries such as UK that are running deficits and relying on financial markets to fund them are “definitely” at risk of another Liz Truss moment, said Mark Coombs, chief executive officer at asset manager Ashmore Group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚主要港口铁矿石装运量创十月份新高
item.description: 澳大利亚一个主要出口码头的铁矿石装运量在 10 月份创下历史新高，原因是尽管面临经济逆风，但中国的需求仍有韧性。【原文：Iron ore shipments from a major Australian export terminal rose to a record high for October, as Chinese demand proved resilient despite economic headwinds.】

item.title: 小米实现收支平衡后，将 2025 年电动汽车交付目标提高到 40 万辆
item.description: 小米公司目前预计今年将交付 40 多万辆汽车，这表明其电动汽车业务的盈利速度比同行快得多。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. now expects to deliver more than 400,000 cars this year, showing accelerating momentum from an electric vehicle business that’s become profitable much faster than its peers.】

item.title: 没关系，英伟达说人工智能没有泡沫
item.description:
在黄健翔看来，一切都很美好，但他的视角 却是独一无二的。【原文：

Everything looks great to Jensen Huang, but his vantage point is one of a kind.

】

item.title: 人工智能威胁破坏波兰价值 1 万亿美元的经济派对
item.description:
克拉科夫已成为商业服务工作的中心，其工资水平在波兰名列前茅。

Krakow became a hub for business services jobs, driving salaries to the highest in Poland. Now the city is learning to live with artificial intelligence.

】

item.title: 黎巴嫩愿意听取国际货币基金组织关于弥补 800 亿美元资金缺口的法律意见
item.description: 黎巴嫩总理纳瓦夫-萨拉姆（Nawaf Salam）表示，他愿意听取国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）对一项旨在解决金融部门约 800 亿美元赤字的法律草案的意见，这将为受危机影响的黎巴嫩获得急需的资金铺平道路。【原文：Lebanon’s Prime Minister Nawaf Salam said he’s open to input from the International Monetary Fund on a draft law seeking to tackle an estimated $80 billion deficit in the financial sector, which would pave the way to unlocking much-needed funds for the crisis-hit nation.】

item.title: 英国博彩公司警告将向客户加税
item.description: 博彩公司警告说，如果英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在其预算案中对博彩公司进行征税，他们将关闭商店并削减工作岗位。但赌客们也可能首当其冲：赔率可能会进一步向博彩公司倾斜。【原文：Gambling firms have warned they’ll shut shops and slash jobs if Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves launches a tax raid on them in her budget. But punters are also likely to bear the brunt: The odds might be stacked even further in the house’s favor.】

item.title: 韩国央行会议前首尔公寓价格重拾升势
item.description: 韩国的房地产市场开始回暖，扭转了连续三周价格上涨放缓的局面，这一信号加强了央行在下周政策会议上保持利率稳定的理由。【原文：South Korea’s property market picked up steam, reversing from three straight weeks of moderating price increases in a signal that strengthens the case for the central bank to hold interest rates steady at next week’s policy meeting.】
